turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there! How can I help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Could you help me with placing an order at Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure! did you have a location in mind?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, the location in Horsham, Pennsylvania on Horsham Road.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is it at 301 Horsham Rd?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! yes, what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could I have a cinnamon dolce latte?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, which size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: A grande Cinnamon Dolce Latte, okay. Did you want to add whip cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it! also did you want the caramel drizzle?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good! and for the milk, any special requests?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, could you make it almond milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Almond milk, sure thing. Please note the whip cream will be made with regular milk though.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. That's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright great!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay so I have a grande Cinnamon Dolce Latte, with almond milk, whip cream and caramel drizzle.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Does that sound right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that sounds great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Wonderful! give me a moment to send it on over to the location in Horsham.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: My pleasure!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: All set! your order has been sent to your desired location. It will be ready for pickup in 5-8 min.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thank you so much for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're very welcome.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have a great day.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks. You too.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thanks!! goodbye!
